text: Ceroplesis conradti is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Kolbe in 1893. It is known from Tanzania and the Central African Republic.BioLib.cz - Ceroplesis conradti. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. It contains the varietas Ceroplesis conradti var. fulvovestita. The species feeds on Acacia decurrens and Chlorophora excelsa. ==References== Category:Ceroplesis Category:Beetles described in 1893
title: Ceroplesis conradti
